name: Kombi The Timeless Gloves - Women's
description: Insulated gloves for warm hands and a good grip when hitting the slopes or swinging an ice axe. The Timeless Gloves feature a polyester shell with leather trim for extra durability, and a waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane to resist wetness. Primaloft® Gold insulation wraps hands in warmth, and a wool-blend lining wicks moisture to keep your fingers dry and comfortable. The palm is a mix of leather and synthetic leather for a firm grip on ice tools, ski poles or handshakes if you do some impromptu networking on the chairlift.Shell is polyester with leather trim for durable weather protection.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane with Gore Warm technology to keep your hands warmer longer in all conditions.Primaloft® Gold polyester microfibre insulation offers 360 degrees of warmth.Leather and synthetic leather palm is durable and grippy.Wool-blend lining wicks moisture and is naturally antimicrobial.Adjustable wrist strap and cuff drawcord seals out snow and drafts.
